title: solr.PhoneticFilterFactory: allow for custom codecs
description: solr.PhoneticFilterFactory currently only accepts codecs from commons codec. Some users may have their own codec implementations. The Factory should accept a class name. The class should implement the StringEncoder interface.

comments.author: David Smiley
comments.content: This feature was implemented some time ago.  It's definitely in Solr 3.  Simply specify the full class name to the "encoder" attribute.
